sentences.en: A dynamo is used to generate electricity.
bicycle lights powered by a dynamo
sentences.cn: 以直流发电机供电的自行车车灯

sentences.en: But let the dynamo slow down and the whole system lags.
sentences.cn: 但是一旦这台发电机减速运转,整个车都会慢下来.

sentences.en: Dynamo: machine that can keep going with little fuel.
sentences.cn: 永动机: 用少量燃油就可以运转的机器.
迪纳摩队的防守看起来已瓦解了.

sentences.en: He has a bicycle with lights powered by a dynamo.
sentences.cn: 他自行车上的灯由发电机提供能源.

sentences.en: I'm afraid the trouble is in the dynamo.
sentences.cn: 恐怕毛病出在直流发电机上.
迈尔斯是个精力充沛的人。

sentences.en: Payne was a dynamo in pursuit of his goal, however.
sentences.cn: 然而,在追求自己的目标时, 佩恩是位精力充沛的人.

sentences.en: So let us make use of this dynamo, which is you.
sentences.cn: 所以,让我们好好利用心中的这个神灵.

sentences.en: The dynamo conked out so we've got no electricity.
sentences.cn: 发电机出了故障，所以停电了。

sentences.en: The last game was against a Luftwaffe teamwhich lost to Dynamo 5 - 2 .
sentences.cn: 最后一场是狄纳莫足球队对德国空军,结果德国2:5输给了 狄纳莫.

sentences.en: The model adopts DYNAMO language specialized in system dynamics analysis to conduct imitation calculation.
sentences.cn: 模型采用系统动力学专用的DYNAMO语言实现模拟运算.

sentences.en: The operation was given the code name Dynamo.
sentences.cn: 这次行动的代号为“发电机”。

sentences.en: Thegenesis pertains to dynamo metamorphism hydrothermal metasomatic deposit under structural control.
sentences.cn: 其成因类型属于受构造控制的动力变质热液交代矿床.

trans.tran_cn: 精力充沛的人，[物]发电机
trans.tran_en: a machine that changes some other form of power directly into electricity
